verses.verse: Would to <S%G3785>God<s%> ye could <S%G430>bear<s%> with <S%G3450>me<s%> a <S%G3397>little<s%> in my <S%G877>folly<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G235>indeed<s%> <S%G430>bear<s%> with <S%G3450>me<s%>. indeed bear: or, indeed ye do bear with me

<S%G1063>For<s%> I am <S%G2206>jealous<s%> over <S%G5209>you<s%> with <S%G2316>godly<s%> <S%G2205>jealousy<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> I have <S%G718>espoused<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> to <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G435>husband<s%>, that I may <S%G3936>present<s%> you as a <S%G53>chaste<s%> <S%G3933>virgin<s%> to <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> I <S%G5399>fear<s%>, <S%G3381>lest<s%> by any <S%G4458>means<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G3789>serpent<s%> <S%G1818>beguiled<s%> <S%G2096>Eve<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3834>subtilty<s%>, <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3540>minds<s%> should be <S%G5351>corrupted<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G572>simplicity<s%> that is <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G3303><s%> he that <S%G2064>cometh<s%> <S%G2784>preacheth<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, <S%G3739>whom<s%> we <S%G2784>have<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2784>preached<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> if ye <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> ye <S%G2983>have<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2983>received<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G2098>gospel<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> ye <S%G1209>have<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1209>accepted<s%>, ye <S%G430>might<s%> <S%G2573>well<s%> bear <S%G430>with<s%> him. with him: or, with me
<S%G1063>For<s%> I <S%G3049>suppose<s%> I <S%G5302>was<s%> not a <S%G3367>whit<s%> <S%G5302>behind<s%> the <S%G5228>very<s%> <S%G3029>chiefest<s%> <S%G652>apostles<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G1499>though<s%> I be <S%G2399>rude<s%> in <S%G3056>speech<s%>, <S%G235>yet<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> in <S%G1108>knowledge<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> we have been <S%G1722>throughly<s%> <S%G3956><s%> made <S%G5319>manifest<s%> <S%G1519>among<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%>.

<S%G2228><s%> Have I <S%G4160>committed<s%> an <S%G266>offence<s%> in <S%G5013>abasing<s%> <S%G1683>myself<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> might be <S%G5312>exalted<s%>, <S%G3754>because<s%> I have <S%G2097>preached<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1432>freely<s%>?
I <S%G4813>robbed<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G1577>churches<s%>, <S%G2983>taking<s%> <S%G3800>wages<s%> of them, <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G1248>do<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G1248>service<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> when I was <S%G3918>present<s%> <S%G4314>with<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5302>wanted<s%>, I <S%G3756>was<s%> <S%G2655>chargeable<s%> to no <S%G3762>man<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> that which was <S%G5303>lacking<s%> to <S%G3450>me<s%> the <S%G80>brethren<s%> which <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia<s%> <S%G4322>supplied<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things I have <S%G5083>kept<s%> <S%G1683>myself<s%> from being <S%G4>burdensome<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> so will I <S%G5083>keep<s%> myself.

As the <S%G225>truth<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1698>me<s%><S%G3754>,<s%> no <S%G3756>man<s%> shall <S%G4972>stop<s%> <S%G5420><s%> <S%G1519>me<s%> <S%G1691><s%> of <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2746>boasting<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2824>regions<s%> of <S%G882>Achaia<s%>. no man: Gr. this boasting shall not be stopped in me
<S%G1302>Wherefore<s%>? <S%G3754>because<s%> I <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>? <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1492>knoweth<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> I <S%G4160>do<s%>, <S%G2532>that<s%> I will <S%G4160>do<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> I may cut <S%G1581>off<s%> <S%G874>occasion<s%> from them which <S%G2309>desire<s%> <S%G874>occasion<s%>; <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G1722>wherein<s%> <S%G3739><s%> they <S%G2744>glory<s%>, they may be <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> are false <S%G5570>apostles<s%>, <S%G1386>deceitful<s%> <S%G2040>workers<s%>, transforming <S%G3345>themselves<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G652>apostles<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G2298>marvel<s%>; <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> is <S%G3345>transformed<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> an <S%G32>angel<s%> of <S%G5457>light<s%>.

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> it is <S%G3756>no<s%> great <S%G3173>thing<s%> <S%G1499>if<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1249>ministers<s%> <S%G1499>also<s%> be <S%G3345>transformed<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G1249>ministers<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness<s%>; <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G5056>end<s%> shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%>.

I <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%>, <S%G1380>Let<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G1380>think<s%> <S%G1511>me<s%> <S%G3165><s%> a <S%G878>fool<s%>; if <S%G1490>otherwise<s%>, <S%G2579>yet<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G878>fool<s%> <S%G1209>receive<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G2504>I<s%> may boast <S%G2744>myself<s%> <S%G5100>a<s%> <S%G3397>little<s%>. receive: or, suffer

That <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G2980>speak<s%>, I <S%G2980>speak<s%> it <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> it were <S%G1722>foolishly<s%> <S%G877><s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G5287>confidence<s%> of <S%G2746>boasting<s%>.
Seeing <S%G1893>that<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2744>glory<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>, I will <S%G2744>glory<s%> <S%G2504>also<s%>.
<S%G1063>For<s%> ye <S%G430>suffer<s%> <S%G878>fools<s%> <S%G2234>gladly<s%>, seeing ye yourselves <S%G5607>are<s%> <S%G5429>wise<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> ye <S%G430>suffer<s%>, if a <S%G1536>man<s%> <S%G2615>bring<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> into <S%G2615>bondage<s%>, if a <S%G1536>man<s%> <S%G2719>devour<s%> you, if a <S%G1536>man<s%> <S%G2983>take<s%> of you, if a <S%G1536>man<s%> exalt <S%G1869>himself<s%>, if a <S%G1536>man<s%> <S%G1194>smite<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> the <S%G4383>face<s%>.

I <S%G3004>speak<s%> as <S%G2596>concerning<s%> <S%G819>reproach<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G3754>though<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> had been <S%G770>weak<s%>. <S%G1161>Howbeit<s%> <S%G1722>whereinsoever<s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> is <S%G5111>bold<s%>, (I <S%G3004>speak<s%> <S%G1722>foolishly<s%> <S%G877><s%>,) I am <S%G5111>bold<s%> <S%G2504>also<s%>.

Are <S%G1526>they<s%> <S%G1445>Hebrews<s%>? so am <S%G2504>I<s%>. Are <S%G1526>they<s%> <S%G2475>Israelites<s%>? so am <S%G2504>I<s%>. Are <S%G1526>they<s%> the <S%G4690>seed<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham<s%>? so am <S%G2504>I<s%>.

Are <S%G1526>they<s%> <S%G1249>ministers<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>? (I <S%G2980>speak<s%> as a <S%G3912>fool<s%>) <S%G1473>I<s%> am <S%G5228>more<s%>; <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2873>labours<s%> more <S%G4056>abundant<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4127>stripes<s%> above <S%G5234>measure<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5438>prisons<s%> more <S%G4056>frequent<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2288>deaths<s%> <S%G4178>oft<s%>.
<S%G5259>Of<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> five <S%G3999>times<s%> received <S%G2983>I<s%> <S%G5062>forty<s%> stripes <S%G3844>save<s%> <S%G3391>one<s%>.

<S%G5151>Thrice<s%> was I beaten with <S%G4463>rods<s%>, <S%G530>once<s%> was I <S%G3034>stoned<s%>, <S%G5151>thrice<s%> I suffered <S%G3489>shipwreck<s%>, a night and a <S%G3574>day<s%> I have <S%G4160>been<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1037>deep<s%>;

In <S%G3597>journeyings<s%> <S%G4178>often<s%>, in <S%G2794>perils<s%> of <S%G4215>waters<s%>, in <S%G2794>perils<s%> of <S%G3027>robbers<s%>, in <S%G2794>perils<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> mine own <S%G1085>countrymen<s%>, in <S%G2794>perils<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> the <S%G1484>heathen<s%>, in <S%G2794>perils<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%>, in <S%G2794>perils<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2047>wilderness<s%>, in <S%G2794>perils<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%>, in <S%G2794>perils<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> false <S%G5569>brethren<s%>;

<S%G1722>In<s%> <S%G2873>weariness<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3449>painfulness<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G70>watchings<s%> <S%G4178>often<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3042>hunger<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1373>thirst<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3521>fastings<s%> <S%G4178>often<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5592>cold<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1132>nakedness<s%>.

<S%G5565>Beside<s%> those things that are <S%G3924>without<s%>, that <S%G3588>which<s%> cometh <S%G1999>upon<s%> <S%G3450>me<s%> <S%G2250>daily<s%><S%G2596>,<s%> the <S%G3308>care<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1577>churches<s%>.

<S%G5101>Who<s%> is <S%G770>weak<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> I <S%G770>am<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G770>weak<s%>? <S%G5101>who<s%> is <S%G4624>offended<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G4448>burn<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>?
<S%G1487>If<s%> I must <S%G1163>needs<s%> <S%G2744>glory<s%>, I will <S%G2744>glory<s%> of the things which <S%G3588>concern<s%> <S%G3450>mine<s%> <S%G769>infirmities<s%>.

The <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G5607>is<s%> <S%G2128>blessed<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G165>evermore<s%>, <S%G1492>knoweth<s%> that <S%G3754>I<s%> <S%G5574>lie<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>.

<S%G1722>In<s%> <S%G1154>Damascus<s%> the <S%G1481>governor<s%> under <S%G702>Aretas<s%> the <S%G935>king<s%> <S%G5432>kept<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%> of the <S%G1153>Damascenes<s%> with a <S%G5432>garrison<s%>, <S%G2309>desirous<s%> to <S%G4084>apprehend<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%>:

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> a <S%G2376>window<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> a <S%G4553>basket<s%> was I let <S%G5465>down<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G5038>wall<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1628>escaped<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%>.
